Package persistance.adapters

Class AdapterBookDAO

java.lang.Object
persistance.adapters.AdapterBookDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
BookStorage
public class AdapterBookDAO extends Object implements BookStorage
Public class AdapterBook for DAO implementing BookStorage interface This adapter's purpose is to minimize the direct dependency between application code and data access code.
